title: Hyundai to double hybrid lineup; announces $3 billion buyback
description: Hyundai Motor Co. plans to double its hybrid car lineup amid slowing demand for pure electric vehicles and has announced a 4 trillion won share buyback to boost investor returns. The company will increase its hybrid models to 14 and maintain its target of selling 2 million EVs annually by 2030.
